txt.en: 'The earth shook and Járnfast heaved and groaned, but it did not fall. It was built to withstand far worse.'
'The day our foes fled, the hills trembled and shook. They say that day the Dark Lord fell.'
'What I would give for some news from Erebor! How have they fared since the fighting ended?'
'Long have Durin's Folk dwelled in the Iron Hills. Never were these delves wrested from us.'
'Lord Náin has proved the equal to his sire in battle, as well as in rule.'
'We have not forgot our own Balin, and what evil fate befell him in Khazad-dûm.'
'Some say we should block all paths east and south. Others that trade may yet come those ways.'
'We have not the grandeur of Moria or Erebor, but our work is traded just as far and wide.'
'Do they speak of the wane of Dwarf-craft in Erebor? We have seen it here.'
